page.title: Southern Co. Quarterly Profit Rises
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Southern Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=SO.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">SO.N</A>, which supplies power to the U.S. Southeast, said Thursday its third-quarter earnings rose slightly, as increased energy use in the industrial sector and more customers outweighed mild weather and hurricane damage.
